key_talking_points: Sam Bennett (FLA) scores a goal at 2:07 of the first period, assisted by Anton Lundell (FLA) and Brandon Montour (FLA).
The goal puts Florida ahead by one goal early in the game.
The play-by-play should focus on the immediate response from Edmonton.
for_commentary_agent.context: A goal was scored early in the first period, increasing the momentum. The game is also relatively close, so maintaining a play-by-play coverage is appropriate.

high_intensity_events.summary: Goal scored by Sam Bennett (FLA) at 02:07 of the first period.

task_details.specific_guidance: Maintain focus on the scoring sequence and Edmonton's reaction.
